> <OLD>
>
> Hydras Roared furious while he looked around trying to find a way to get out
> that place. then he looked himslef... He was now a trasmetal Hdyras. Red as
> blood, and huge as a normal Decepticon. He looked around hoping to find a
> way out

<NEW>

There was a single door to the chamber that HYDRAS, JHIAXUS and
SCORPONOK were standing in and the way the whole room moved it was
likley they were on some sort of small ship.

"I have to get back up front." JHIAXUS said but you're welcome to come
to the bridge."

Yes, although HYDRAS had recovered himself some strange things had
indeed happened. He seemed to have grown to full DECEPTICON hieght,
roughly 30 - 35' or so, but then again so had JHIAXUS and SCORPONOK.
SCORPONOK was perhaps the tallest of them now, standing at 40 feet and
JHIAXUS stood at nearly HYDRAS, maybe a few feet shorter. Also,
everything in the room looked as if it was sized to be utilized by
transformers of their hight and size.

SCROPONOK stood across the room from HYDRAS looking at him and then he
pointed to the symbol painted on the door that le out of the room. "I
am sure you've seen that sign?"

The symbol was not Autobot or Maximal, Decepticon or Predacon but the
symbol of UNICRON!

(TAG)

- Preston
